channel.name: channel
channel.desc: Conversation ID to fetch thread from.

cursor.name: cursor
cursor.desc: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a next_cursor attribute returned by a previous request's response_metadata. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See pagination for more detail.

include_all_metadata.name: include_all_metadata
include_all_metadata.desc: Return all metadata associated with this message.

inclusive.name: inclusive
inclusive.desc: Include messages with oldest or latest timestamps in results. Ignored unless either timestamp is specified.

latest.name: latest
latest.desc: Only messages before this Unix timestamp will be included in results.

limit.name: limit
limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.

oldest.name: oldest
oldest.desc: Only messages after this Unix timestamp will be included in results.

token.name: token
token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

ts.name: ts
ts.desc: Unique identifier of either a threadâ€™s parent message or a message in the thread. ts must be the timestamp of an existing message with 0 or more replies. If there are no replies then just the single message referenced by ts will return - it is just an ordinary, unthreaded message.

name: conversations.replies
desc: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation

errors.invalid_auth: Some aspect of authentication cannot be validated. Either the provided token is invalid or the request originates from an IP address disallowed from making the request.
errors.channel_not_found: Value for channel was missing or invalid.
errors.invalid_array_arg: The method was passed an array as an argument. Please only input valid strings.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace when using a bot token.
errors.request_timeout: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.
errors.ratelimited: The request has been ratelimited. Refer to the Retry-After header for when to retry the request.
errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for cursor was not valid or is no longer valid.
errors.invalid_ts_oldest: Value passed for oldest was invalid
errors.invalid_arg_name: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of accepted or expected values. This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.
errors.fatal_error: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering a catastrophic error. It's possible some aspect of the operation succeeded before the error was raised.
errors.invalid_arguments: The method was either called with invalid arguments or some detail about the arguments passed is invalid, which is more likely when using complex arguments like blocks or attachments.
errors.invalid_form_data: The method was called via a POST request with Content-Typeapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.
errors.org_login_required: The workspace is undergoing an enterprise migration and will not be available until migration is complete.
errors.missing_scope: The token used is not granted the specific scope permissions required to complete this request.
errors.thread_not_found: Value for ts was missing or invalid.
errors.token_revoked: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace or the app has been removed when using a user token.
errors.ekm_access_denied: Administrators have suspended the ability to post a message.
errors.no_permission: The workspace token used in this request does not have the permissions necessary to complete the request. Make sure your app is a member of the conversation it's attempting to post a message to.
errors.invalid_metadata_filter_keys: Value passed for metadata_keys_to_include was invalid. Must be valid json array of strings.
errors.internal_error: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering an error, likely due to a transient issue on our end. It's possible some aspect of the operation succeeded before the error was raised.
errors.not_allowed_token_type: The token type used in this request is not allowed.
errors.enterprise_is_restricted: The method cannot be called from an Enterprise.
errors.accesslimited: Access to this method is limited on the current network
errors.invalid_ts_latest: Value passed for latest was invalid
errors.invalid_post_type: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/jsonapplication/x-www-form-urlencodedmultipart/form-datatext/plain.
errors.team_added_to_org: The workspace associated with your request is currently undergoing migration to an Enterprise Organization. Web API and other platform operations will be intermittently unavailable until the transition is complete.
errors.missing_post_type: The method was called via a POST request and included a data payload, but the request did not include a Content-Type header.
errors.team_access_not_granted: The token used is not granted the specific workspace access required to complete this request.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.access_denied: Access to a resource specified in the request is denied.
errors.invalid_charset: The method was called via a POST request, but the charset specified in the Content-Type header was invalid. Valid charset names are: utf-8iso-8859-1.

warnings.missing_charset: The method was called via a POST request, and recommended practice for the specified Content-Type is to include a charset parameter. However, no charset was present. Specifically, non-form-data content types (e.g. text/plain) are the ones for which charset is recommended.
warnings.superfluous_charset: The method was called via a POST request, and the specified Content-Type is not defined to understand the charset parameter. However, charset was in fact present. Specifically, form-data content types (e.g. multipart/form-data) are the ones for which charset is superfluous.
